topics.body:
Answer: technocrat.

Essentially the belief that positions of governmental power should be decided by accreditation rather than affiliation.  Essentially if someone is in charge of NASA they better damn well be a scientist.  If someone is on the supreme court bench they better damn well be a lawyer.
